short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply paste your bank statements into the top input box to find amounts by source.(ex. Doordash's tag is DOORDASH.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: cashScan is a budgeting to tool used to find the sum of all your expenses from a given source. Ever want to know how much money you spent this month on Doordash, gas, or any other source? This is the tool for you. Right click the extension icon and click "options" for a brief tutorial. Simply paste your bank statements into the top input box to find amounts by source.(ex. Doordash's tag is DOORDASH.) Short demonstration: https://youtu.be/wmjkjAlwmiU.
